title: Kings.Bounty.Dark.Side.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Kings.Bounty.Dark.Side.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Year: 2014
Genre: RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: 1C-SoftClub
Publisher: 1C-SoftClub
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus 
Voice Language: Eng |Rus 
Crack: 3DM

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: 2.6 GHz and better
Memory: 1 GB
Video: nVidia GeForce 6600 with 128 Mb VRAM or similar AMD card
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 7.77 GB

Game information:

Continuing the adventure saga King's Bounty you get to know the 
dark side of the world Teana and take a trip on an unprecedented 
land, which boils bloodshed.
For the first time in the history of the famous series, you get 
to choose the race of the main character. Meet the new heroes of 
King's Bounty! Fearless orc warrior Bagyr more than others know 
how important Fury in an unequal battle. A natural leader 
demoness Neolin having persuasive, even in the most difficult 
battle to maintain a high morale of his troops. And Daert vampire 
who does not know equal to the sinister art of dark magic. 
Each of them has its own story ...

Game Features:

15 uncharted territories;
More than 100 jobs;
The new system of companions - 
different satellites for each character;
New combat ally;
New units, artifacts, and the ability of Fury.

Repack Features:

King's Bounty: Dark Side
Version of the game - v1.5.1047.1747
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

Premium Edition Content:

Unique amulet that gives a bonus to 
gain experience and money
Two additional locations
More than a dozen new jobs, a new 
combat unit and other in-game bonuses
